mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_REPORT ( MEMBER_CODE, REPORT_TYPE, REPORT_TITLE, REPORT_INFO, REPORT_CYCLE ) VALUES ( #{ memberCode }, #{ reportType }, #{ reportTitle }, #{ reportInfo }, #{ reportCycle } )
INSERT INTO TBL_REPORTER ( REPORT_CODE, MEMBER_CODE ) VALUES ( #{ reportCode }, #{ listItem } );
mapper.select: SELECT REPORT_CODE, MEMBER_CODE, REPORT_TYPE, REPORT_TITLE, REPORT_INFO, REPORT_CYCLE, READ_STATUS, COMPLETION_STATUS FROM TBL_REPORT WHERE MEMBER_CODE = #{ searchConditions.memberCode } AND REPORT_TYPE = #{ searchConditions.reportType } AND COMPLETION_STATUS = #{ searchConditions.completionStatus } ORDER BY REPORT_CODE DESC LIMIT #{ startRow }, #{ limit }
SELECT REPORT_CODE FROM TBL_REPORT WHERE MEMBER_CODE = #{ memberCode } AND REPORT_TYPE = 'Routine' AND COMPLETION_STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY REPORT_CODE DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT ROUND_CODE, REPORT_CODE, ROUND_TITLE, ROUND_BODY, REG_DATE, CAPACITY FROM TBL_REPORT_ROUND WHERE REPORT_CODE = #{ reportCode } ORDER BY REPORT_CODE DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT REPORT_CODE, MEMBER_CODE, REPORT_TYPE, REPORT_TITLE, REPORT_INFO, REPORT_CYCLE, READ_STATUS, COMPLETION_STATUS FROM TBL_REPORT WHERE MEMBER_CODE = #{ memberCode } AND REPORT_TYPE = 'Casual' ORDER BY REPORT_CODE DESC LIMIT 10
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_REPORT_ROUND ( REPORT_CODE, ROUND_TITLE, ROUND_BODY, CAPACITY ) VALUES ( #{ reportCode }, #{ roundTitle }, #{roundBody }, #{ capacity } )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TBL_REPORTER WHERE REPORT_CODE = #{ reportCode };
mapper.select: SELECT ROUND_CODE, REPORT_CODE, ROUND_TITLE, ROUND_BODY, REG_DATE, CAPACITY FROM TBL_REPORT_ROUND WHERE REPORT_CODE = #{ searchCondition } ORDER BY REPORT_CODE DESC LIMIT #{ startRow }, #{ limit }
SELECT A.MEMBER_CODE FROM TBL_REPORT A WHERE A.REPORT_CODE = #{ reportCode } UNION ALL SELECT B.MEMBER_CODE FROM TBL_REPORTER B WHERE B.REPORT_CODE = #{ reportCode }
